analyzed: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mi shigs pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the indestructible of the explained characteristics is the basis of the eight-lined [mantra],

original: chos thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa'o //

original: 'di la yid dang rdul gyis bris pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
